Fri, 25 May 2007 14:30:00 -0400 Date: Fri, 25 May 2007 14:30:00 -0400 (EDT) From: sblackman@guthyrenkerlegal.com To: abuse@ev1servers.net Cc: sharper@guthy-renker.com Message-ID: <11794569.1041180117800721.JavaMail.cicusr@plcicap1.prod.cyveillance.com > X-ASG-Orig-Subj: NOTICE OF INTELLECTUAL PROPERTY INFINGEMENT [ID3:[bWTZT`_jQd19:ID3] Subject: NOTICE OF INTELLECTUAL PROPERTY INFINGEMENT [ID3:[bWTZT`_jQd19:ID3] MIME-Version: 1.0 Content-Type: multipart/mixed; boundary="----=_Part_104_11098999.1180117800719" X-Virus-Scanned: by Barracuda Spam Firewall at ev1servers.net X-Barracuda-Spam-Score: 0.00 X-Barracuda-Spam-Status: No, SCORE=0.00 using global scores of TAG_LEVEL=4.0 QUARANTINE_LEVEL=1000.0 KILL_LEVEL=8.0 WHITELISTED X-OriginalArrivalTime: 25 May 2007 18:30:16.0661 (UTC) FILETIME=[BDCBC850:01C79EFA] (multipart/mixed) MIME element (text/html)

Ladies and Gentlemen:

 

RE: Case No. 1.58.4

 

Please be advised that I am General Counsel for Guthy-Renker Corporation (?Guthy-Renker?) of Santa Monica, California, representing Guthy-Renker in its intellectual property legal matters.  My client is the owner of U.S. Registration No. 1,890,769 PROACTIV and U.S. Register No. 2,574,142 PROACTIV for promotion and sale of a variety of goods and services, including acne treatment preparations and related cosmetic products.

 

As you may be aware, Guthy-Renker has for several years successfully marketed and sold its Proactiv? acne treatment products through extensive promotion including ongoing television infomercial advertising and via the Internet, making Proactiv? products and their distinctive packaging well-known to customers throughout the United States.  As you may also be aware, Guthy-Renker is the owner of certain copyrighted text and images on particular packaging which it created to sell Proactiv?.

 

Guthy-Renker recently became aware of your domain http://www.proactiveacnemedications.com/, which lists Abuse Department as the Registrant, in what we believe is an improper attempt to capitalize upon the goodwill associated with Guthy-Renker?s Proactiv? name for your benefit.  This constitutes unfair competition and trademark infringement under Federal and California law.  We have tried on several occasions to reach you to see if you have any legitimate purpose for your use of http://www.proactiveacnemedications.com/ name, but you have failed or elected not to respond to our inquiries.  We must therefore assume that you have no legitimate purpose or reason to have registered a domain name utilizing the Proactiv mark.

 

The Anti-Cybersquatting Consumer Protection Act (?ACPA?) provides relief to trademark owners who are victims of cybersquatting.  The ACPA bans the practice of registering famous trademarks in bad faith as domain names in the expectation that the legitimate trademark owner will seek to purchase the domain from the individual cybersquatter at a premium.  The Act also covers situations where individuals register well-known trademarks to profit from misusing the domain name by diverting customers from the mark owner?s site to the cybersquatter?s own site or to other sites for profit.  Additionally, the Act applies to all domain names registered before, on, or after the date of enactment.  The trademark owner is eligible for up to $100,000 per domain name in! statutory damages.  [Section 1117(d)]

 

The Lanham Act, 15 U.S. Code, Section 1117, also provides for recovery of profits, damages, as well as a sum up to three (3) times the amount of damages for any violation of 15 U.S. Code, Section 1125(d) and attorney fees in exceptional cases involving willfulness.

 

Accordingly, demand is made that you immediately cease-and-desist from any further use of the Proactiv? trademark and from operating under the domain name.  Additionally, demand is made that your company convey ownership of http://www.proactiveacnemedications.com/ to Guthy-Renker Corporation.

 

Provided you immediately comply with our reasonable demands, a lawsuit may be avoided. If your unauthorized use of Guthy-Renker?s intellectual property continues, and we do not hear from you within five (5) days from the date of this email, we will have no alternative but to assume that you do no intend to cooperate, and Guthy-Renker will take steps necessary to protect is valuable assets, including, without limitation, the filing of a suit against your company, seeking immediately injunctive relief and all damages allowable under the law or to initiate an Internet Corporation of Assigned Names and Numbers (ICANN) mandatory arbitration proceeding.

 

We shall be monitoring the domain and await your response to this email or in writing to this office.  Should you have any questions or comments regarding Guthy-Renker?s position in this matter, contact me by telephone.

 

Nothing herein shall constitute a waiver of any  of Guthy-Renker?s rights in law or in equity, all of which are expressly reserved.

 

Sincerely,

 

GUTHY-RENKER CORPORATION

 

 

Stephanie Blackman, Esq.

3340 Ocean Park Blvd, Suite 3055

Santa Monica CA 90405

+1 (310) 581-6250

 

 

 

MIME element (text/plain)
